metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5784 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Apache Axis 1.4 and earlier, as used in PayPal Payments Pro, PayPal MassPay, PayPal Transactional Information SOAP, the Java Message Serviceimplementation in Apache ActiveMQ, and other products, does not verify thatthe server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN)or subjectAltName field of the X.509 certificate, which allowsman-in-the-middle attackers to spoof SSL servers via an arbitrary validcertificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5784` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libaxis-java - 1.4-16.2ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: axis package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4-16.2ubuntu1').
